roleset.name: come up with a new idea

example.name: the one example
example.text: We innovated telephone redemptions, daily dividends, total elimination of share certificates and the constant $1 pershare pricing, all of which were painfully thought out and not the result of some inadvertence on the part of the SEC.
example.arg: telephone redemptions, daily dividends, total elimination of share certificates and the constant $1 pershare pricing, all of which were painfully thought out and not the result of some inadvertence on the part of the SEC.

example.name: Both args
example.text: Tiger 's innovation of hub-and-spoke and containerized-cargo operations

example.name: Arg 1 only
example.text: a brilliant innovation for spreading a religion

example.name: Marginal arg 1, just be sure you can't also have a more detailed example of the new idea (that you're not annotating the type of new idea rather than the idea itself)

roleset.note: INNOVATE-V NOTES: Member of Vncls establish-55.5. Checked by Julia, 10/2010. (from innovate.01-v)
INNOVATION-N NOTES: Based on sentences in nouns-00040. Comparison to innovate.01. Vn class establish-55.5. No FN class. Framed by Katie. (from innovation.01-n)
INNOVATIVE-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from innovative.01-j)
